body:
You who would do? How would you live? What would be your plan?

My plan is to go to a supermarket to take arms and food, and then go to a school and there I survive until this situation better.

Good Morning!

replies.body: It's funny this topic was made. In the last month just for fun, my friend and I came up with a complete plan of what we would do in the odd case of a zombie apocalypse.
replies.body_tagged: It's funny this topic was made. In the last month just for fun, my friend and I came up with a complete plan of what we would do in the odd case of a zombie apocalypse.

replies.body: do not go to store at first. especially gun store. everyone will go there, it'll be a huge cluster of potential zombies. gather everyone you can and drive somewhere with little to no population. any zombies there would be minimal and easy to kill off. make runs in groups of four or five to the nearest town every once in a while for supplies. set up defenses around your area. don't trust people you don't know, they might be worse than zombies.
replies.body_tagged: do not go to store at first. especially gun store. everyone will go there, it'll be a huge cluster of potential zombies. gather everyone you can and drive somewhere with little to no population. any zombies there would be minimal and easy to kill off. make runs in groups of four or five to the nearest town every once in a while for supplies. set up defenses around your area. don't trust people you don't know, they might be worse than zombies.
